alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Greer; Harmon; Jackson; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 11:22PM CDT until June 18 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washita County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1122 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Bessie to 5 miles southwest of Hobart to 7 miles east of Vinson, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Hobart, Mangum, Cordell, Hollis, Granite, Burns Flat, Carnegie, Sentinel, Blair, Mountain View, Dill City, Corn, Lone Wolf, Mountain Park, Eakly, Roosevelt, Gotebo, Bessie, Martha, and Rocky. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Comanche; Greer; Harmon; Jackson; Kiowa; Washita
